text: Bridge Creek is a small town in Grady County in the US state of Oklahoma. As of the 2020 US census, about 336 people lived there. ==History== Bridge Creek was made a town in 2000. It is part of an area of northern McClain and Grady Counties sometimes called the "Tri-City Area" with Newcastle, Tuttle and Blanchard. ==References== Category:Towns in Oklahoma
title: Bridge Creek, Oklahoma
